title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, create, and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, completion, and embedding workflows.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with multi-model conversations, file uploads, and role-based access.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs with POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, stream, and manage local models in idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fuzzy-find model selection and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Community gRPC service wrapper around Ollama HTTP API for high-performance micro-service deployments.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and common models for declarative deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate with tokio-based async client and strongly-typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated registry of community-tuned GGUF models ready for one-click import into Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in any channel.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints for web apps with rate-limiting.
